summary: This is an automatic out-of-office email reply from a US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY) employee, dated June 28, 2019. It indicates the employee is unavailable and provides alternative contacts for assistance, but does not contain substantive information about the Epstein case.
keyFacts: The document is an automatic out-of-office reply from an employee at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY).
The email is dated June 28, 2019, which is shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019.
The subject line references 'Epstein; JMD Media Guideline', suggesting the original email was related to media guidelines concerning Jeffrey Epstein.
The document itself contains no substantive case information, only an automated response.
The email provides alternative contacts for assistance, but the contact names are not included in the provided text.
